lyrics.text:
Si’i kāinga ongosia,
He fononga ki he Langi,
Fai pē homou fatongia,
‘Oua e nofo pē mo tangi.
Si! Ko e le’o ‘o e ‘Eiki
‘Oku fanafana mai,
“Te mou mālōlō ki Langi
‘I he ‘api ‘o e Tamai.”

Ke mou kīkītaki atu,
‘Oua e fiu he faingata’a:
Lau ‘a e Tohi ‘o manatu
Ki he kau fononga mu’a.
Naʻa nau ma’u ‘a e Tala’ofa,
Na’a nau ngāue pē ki ai,
‘O nau mālōlō ki Langi,
‘I he ‘api ‘o e Tamai.

‘Oiseuke! ‘A e mamahi
‘A e kakai na’e lotu mu’a:
Naʻe sipi’i, manuki’i,
Tutu, mo kilisi ua!
Ka na’e ‘ikai te nau fo’i,
Na’a nau ma’u ‘a e palōmesi;
‘O nau mālōlō ki Langi
‘I he ‘api ‘o e Tamai.

Manatu’i ‘enau ngāue
‘O ka mou ka mafasia.
Fei mo fakapuepue;
Te mou ma’u homou tofi’a:
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku taki,
‘O Ne fanafana mai
“Oku ofi fau ‘a Langi
Mo e ‘api ‘o e Tamai.”

Mālō ‘Eiki ho’o ‘ofa
He kakai mama’o fau.
‘Alu’alu pe ‘i mala,
Toki tau ki he monū!
Ta’e’alo’aloa ai pē
Te mau lave pē ki ai!
Ke mau mālōlō ki Langi
‘I he ‘api ‘o e Tamai. *
C.P.W.B.
